pages.text: $(li)The Chute drops under it any item inserted via automation, for example, by a $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/hopper)$(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/hopper)Hopper$(/l)$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/dropper)Dropper$(/l).
$(li)It will stop dropping items if it's receiving a redstone signal or a block is placed under it.
